The travel photos are authentic and can be used as a reference when planning your next trip. Plan your perfect trip with Trip.com.
data.text:
@ HADRIAN'S ARCH IN ATHENS!

HADRIAN'S ARCH IS ANOTHER HISTORICAL LANDMARK IN ATHENS, GREECE. THE FAMOUS LANDMARK IS ALSO THE TOURIST HOTSPOT VISITING ATHENS. THERE IS NO TICKET BEING CHARGED TO ADMIRE THIS BEAUTIFUL STRUCTURE. ENTRANCE IS FREE AND IT IS OPENED 24 HOURS EVERY DAY. THE ARCH SHAPED MARBLE GATEWAY WITH CORINTHIAN COLUMNS KS NAMED FPR AN ANCIENT ROMAN EMPEROR #passionpassport #mytripvlog #urbanexplorer #tripblazers #awesomepic #cafe #awesomepic #celebratewithtrip #couplestrip #2023travelwish #passionpassport

THE VACATIONER!
